itunes:title: 5 tips for living your healthiest & happiest life
title: 5 tips for living your healthiest & happiest life
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
In a world where living your healthiest & happiest life can feel overwhelming, britt is sharing the 5 things you can always come back to. Get ready to talk mindset, hydration, proper nutrition, moving your body & staying consistent!

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!


Timestamps

00:30 the fundamentals

1:15 sharing our fun & gains of the week

2:50 reflection

3:30 gratitude

4:00 weekly review

5:00 starting out is hard

6:12 TIP #1 - MENTAL HEALTH

7:15 the comparison game

8:00 come as you are 

10:25 our minds give up before our bodies 

10:55 TIP #2 - HYDRATION

11:30 take care of yourself in the simple ways

14:15 TIP #3 - NUTRITION

14:45 nutrient dense foods

16:00 macronutrients

17:47 micronutrients

18:20 eat healthy to be healthy over skinny

20:38 TIP #4 - MOVEMENT

24:00 training resources

25:58 TIP #5 - CONSISTENCY

27:10 it adds up

27:45 why you should ditch perfection

29:30 the only checklist you need
